description: E p i t o m e   o f   T a n h ̣ u m   b e n   J o s e p h ' s   c o m m e n t a r y   o n   t h e   P r i o r   P r o p h e t s   a n d   o n   p a r t s   o f   I s a i a h   ( t h e   l a t t e r   a g r e e s   w i t h   A b u ̄   a l - W a l i ̄ d   M a r w a ̄ n   I b n   J a n a ̄ h ̣ ' s   K i t a ̄ b   a l - U s s u ̄ l )
title: Epitome of Tanḥum ben Joseph's commentary on the Prior Prophets and on parts of Isaiah (the latter agrees with Abū al-Walīd Marwān Ibn Janāḥ's Kitāb al-Ussūl)
author: Tanḥum ben Joseph, of Jerusalem
